name: JJ's Big Day
description:
Ideally, you would be able to play this game on controller, but Unity is having trouble supporting controller input on WebGL builds.

Here are the Keyboard Inputs:

Move Horizontally: a/d keys

Jump: space bar

Wall Grab: Right Shift

Pause: Esc (when the game is paused, use wasd keys to navigate the menu, space bar to select an option)

People have given me mixed feedback on the keyboard button mapping, so let me know what you think of it!
